prompt: Generate realistic text messages that represent non-spam (ham) content. These messages should reflect a broad spectrum of everyday communication, including personal conversations, legitimate business or service notifications, casual updates, and automated alerts. Vary the tone (friendly, professional, neutral, concerned), language style (informal chats, formal announcements, concise or detailed), and topics (meeting or appointment reminders, family or friend check-ins, order or delivery confirmations, bank transaction alerts, community or event updates). Include diverse formats like quick one-word replies, detailed explanations, friendly greetings, or automated system messages (e.g., OTP codes, subscription reminders). Ensure the content simulates authentic, non-malicious communication across different contexts, relationships, and platforms, avoiding any deceptive or promotional undertones.
response:
Hey! Just wanted to check in and see how your day is going.  
Don't forget our meeting tomorrow at 10 AM. Let me know if you need to reschedule.  
Your package has been shipped and is expected to arrive by Friday.  
Just got your message, will call you back in a bit!  
Reminder: Your subscription will renew on the 15th.  
Can you pick up some groceries on your way home? We're out of milk!  
Your OTP for login is 123456.  
Hope you’re having a good week! Let’s catch up soon.  
Your appointment with Dr. Smith is confirmed for next Monday at 2 PM.  
Just a heads up, the team meeting has been moved to Thursday.  
I saw the movie you recommended; it was fantastic!  
Your recent bank transaction of $45.67 was successful.  
Let me know if you’re free this weekend; I’d love to hang out!  
Thanks for your payment! Your invoice has been received.  
Please confirm your attendance for the community event next Friday.  
I’m running late but should be there in about 15 minutes.  
The report is due by the end of the day. Please make sure to submit it on time.  
Your delivery is scheduled for tomorrow between 2 PM and 4 PM.  
Just checking in to see how your mom is doing.  
I’ll be out of the office next week, but I’ll respond to emails when I return.  
The concert tickets you ordered are ready for pickup.  
Can we reschedule our lunch for next week? Something came up.  
Your feedback on the project is much appreciated!  
I’m so sorry to hear about your loss. I’m here for you if you need anything.  
Please let me know if you can help with the event setup on Saturday.  
Your account has been successfully verified. Thank you!  
Do you want to join us for a hike this weekend?  
Your order has been delivered! Let us know if everything looks good.  
I’ve sent you the details for the conference next month.  
Thanks for the reminder! I’ll start working on that today.  
Just wanted to say congrats on your promotion!  
Your flight is confirmed for next Tuesday at 3 PM.  
We’re having a potluck at work next Friday; bring your favorite dish!  
The kids are excited about the camping trip next week!  
Your password has been reset. Please check your email for the new one.  
Looking forward to seeing you at the family gathering!  
The charity run is next Saturday; hope you can join!  
Just a quick reminder about the deadline for the project submissions.  
I really appreciate your help with the presentation!  
Your feedback form has been submitted successfully.  
Hope you’re feeling better! Let me know if you need anything.  
The meeting notes are attached for your reference.  
Let’s plan for coffee next week to discuss the new project!  
Your car service appointment is set for Wednesday at 9 AM.  
Thanks for your patience while we resolve this issue.  
I’ve added you to the group chat for the event planning.  
Your loan application is currently under review.  
Just checking in to see if you received my last email.  
I’m really excited about the trip! Have you booked your tickets yet?  
Please confirm if you received the documents I sent over.  
Your reservation has been successfully made for dinner tomorrow.  
Thanks for being such a great friend; I appreciate you!  
Just a friendly reminder to take a break and relax today.  
Your request for a refund has been processed.  
Looking forward to catching up at the reunion!
